pat.description: Please enter a SmartThings [Personal Access Token]({token_url}) that has been created per the [instructions]({component_url}).  This will be used to create the Home Assistant integration within your SmartThings account.

error.token_unauthorized: The token is invalid or no longer authorized.
error.token_forbidden: The token does not have the required OAuth scopes.
